hereauth.description: Root permission node for HereAuth permissions

auth.description: Allows usage all of the /auth command (for self)

autoauth.description: Allows changing options related to AutoAuth

location.description: Allows changing all location masking options

multiauth.description: Allows toggling all multi-factor auth options

timeout.description: Allows changing MFA timeout to anything

small.description: Allows changing MFA timeout to a small number (defined in config.yml)

medium.description: Allows changing MFA timeout to a medium number (defined in config.yml)

big.description: Allows changing MFA timeout to infinity or a big number (defined in config.yml)

rename.description: Allows renaming another player's account with /rename

register.description: Allows using the /register command if not registered

unregister.description: Allows using the /unregister command to unregister another player's account

changepw.description: Allows using the /chpw command to change password

import.description: Allows using the /import command to import (and override) data from any external incompatible database

merge.description: Allows importing data without overriding current data

overwrite.description: Allows importing data with current ata being overriden
